description: Creamy avocado spread onto well-toasted bread is one of my favourite meals. It’s so delicious!!
name: Avocado Toast With Pesto & Roasted Roma Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For Basil Pesto:- In a mixer jar, take 20 gm pine nuts, 50 gm parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon salt, a bunch of fresh sweet basil leaves (I used my home grown sweet basil leaves), 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 1 teaspoon black pepper powder, 1 clove of garlic, squeeze half lemon.- Grind this mixture to smooth paste and our pesto is ready!

For Avocado toast:- You need ripe but not overripe 2 Hass avocados.- Look for avocados that yield a bit to a gentle squeeze, but avoid using avocados that are mushy or stringy on the inside.- Mash the avocados, add 1 clove of mashed garlic, lemon juice, 1 teaspoon of black pepper and mix it well.

For slow-roast Roma tomatoes- Preheat oven to 150°C.- Halve the tomatoes horizontally and place, skin-side down on a baking tray. - Add some mashed garlic to each half, sprinkle with the sugar (to caramelise it) and drizzle the olive oil over the top. - Season with salt and pepper and roast in the oven for 1 hour until softened and lightly charred. Set it aside to cool.
Preheat oven to 150°C, cut the Sourdough slices from the loaf and roast it until it turns golden brown.
Take a roasted Sourdough slice, spread pesto and avocado mixture on it.- Add roasted caramelised tomatoes, few fresh basil leaves and sprinkle with black pepper and olive oil.
